mapper.select: select date(regtime) time, count(regtime) count from proof_message_info where date(regtime) between curdate() - 8 and curdate() - 1 and campaign_no = #{no} and authenticated = true group by date(regtime) order by time asc;

select writer, count, profile_image from ( select writer, count(writer) count from proof_message_info where campaign_no = #{no} and authenticated = true group by writer) sub inner join user on sub.writer = user.username;
mapper.insert: insert into proof_message_info (campaign_no, title, content, photo, writer) values (#{campaignNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{photo}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update proof_message_info set authenticated = true where no = #{no}
